         var namingPolicy = options.PropertyNamingPolicy;

         this._nullableStringValueConverter = (global::System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonConverter<string?>)global::Thinktecture.Internal.JsonSerializerOptionsExtensions.GetCustomMemberConverter(options, typeof(string));

         this._nullableIntValueConverter = (global::System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonConverter<int?>)global::Thinktecture.Internal.JsonSerializerOptionsExtensions.GetCustomMemberConverter(options, typeof(int?));

         this._nonNullableDecimalValueConverter = (global::System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonConverter<decimal>)global::Thinktecture.Internal.JsonSerializerOptionsExtensions.GetCustomMemberConverter(options, typeof(decimal));

      }

      /// <inheritdoc />
      public override global::Thinktecture.Tests.TestValueObject? Read(ref global::System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader reader, global::System.Type typeToConvert, global::System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions options)
      {
         if (reader.TokenType == global::System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.Null)
            return default;

         if (reader.TokenType != global::System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.StartObject)
            throw new global::System.Text.Json.JsonException($"Unexpected token \"{reader.TokenType}\" when trying to deserialize \"TestValueObject\". Expected token: \"{(global::System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.StartObject)}\".");

         string? @nullableStringValue = default;
         int? @nullableIntValue = default;
         decimal @nonNullableDecimalValue = default;

         var comparer = options.PropertyNameCaseInsensitive ? global::System.StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase : global::System.StringComparer.Ordinal;

         while (reader.Read())
         {
            if (reader.TokenType == global::System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.EndObject)
               break;

            if (reader.TokenType != global::System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.PropertyName)
               throw new global::System.Text.Json.JsonException($"Unexpected token \"{reader.TokenType}\" when trying to deserialize \"TestValueObject\". Expected token: \"{(global::System.Text.Json.JsonTokenType.PropertyName)}\".");

            var propName = reader.GetString();

            if(!reader.Read())

            {
               @nullableStringValue = this._nullableStringValueConverter.Read(ref reader, typeof(string), options);
            }
            else if (comparer.Equals(propName, this._nullableIntValuePropertyName))
            {
               @nullableIntValue = this._nullableIntValueConverter.Read(ref reader, typeof(int?), options);
            }
            else if (comparer.Equals(propName, this._nonNullableDecimalValuePropertyName))
            {
               @nonNullableDecimalValue = this._nonNullableDecimalValueConverter.Read(ref reader, typeof(decimal), options);
            }
            else
            {
               throw new global::System.Text.Json.JsonException($"Unknown member \"{propName}\" encountered when trying to deserialize \"TestValueObject\".");
            }
         }

                                    @nullableStringValue!,
                                    @nullableIntValue!,

         if (validationError is not null)
            throw new global::System.Text.Json.JsonException(validationError.ToString() ?? "Unable to deserialize \"TestValueObject\".");

         return obj;
      }

      public override void Write(global::System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonWriter writer, global::Thinktecture.Tests.TestValueObject value, global::System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions options)

         writer.WriteStartObject();

         var ignoreNullValues = options.DefaultIgnoreCondition is global::System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull or global::System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingDefault;

         var @nullableStringValuePropertyValue = value.NullableStringValue;

         {
            writer.WritePropertyName(this._nullableStringValuePropertyName);
            this._nullableStringValueConverter.Write(writer, @nullableStringValuePropertyValue, options);
         }
         var @nullableIntValuePropertyValue = value.NullableIntValue;

         if(!ignoreNullValues || @nullableIntValuePropertyValue is not null)
         {
            writer.WritePropertyName(this._nullableIntValuePropertyName);
            this._nullableIntValueConverter.Write(writer, @nullableIntValuePropertyValue, options);

         if(!ignoreDefaultValues || !@nonNullableDecimalValuePropertyValue.Equals(default(decimal)))

            this._nonNullableDecimalValueConverter.Write(writer, @nonNullableDecimalValuePropertyValue, options);
         }
         writer.WriteEndObject();
      }

file class ValueObjectJsonConverterFactory : global::System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonConverterFactory
{
   public override bool CanConvert(global::System.Type typeToConvert)
